title: The Ikigai Framework
description: A quick win: understand The Ikigai Framework.

hook.text: In Okinawa, Japan, people live to 100. They attribute their longevity to ikigai â€” a reason for being.

buildup.text: Ikigai sits at the intersection of what you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, and what pays.

discovery.text: Most people optimize for only one or two circles. Fulfillment requires all four to overlap.

twist.text: Finding your ikigai isn't instant. It's an iterative process of testing and reflecting over years.

climax.text: Map your four circles honestly. Where they overlap is your direction â€” even if imperfect.

punchline.text: Purpose isn't found. It's assembled, piece by piece.

quiz.question: What four elements make up the Ikigai framework?
options: What you love, what you're good at, what the world needs, what pays
